Default.desc: Pick an object to spawn. You can filter by both name and criteria. For example, '*volcanic*/t' will search all stations (including world-scale objects) that include 'volcanic' and match criteria 't'. If searching only by criteria, start your query with '/'. If searching for an object with '/' in the name, put an extra '/' at the end to filter with default criteria (sT: ships and station-scale stations)

Properties.Global: ; Nil is default sov ; ; otherwise spawns as the sovereign type set here ()

; Only applies to ships ; ; Modes are: ; - orbit: orbits an anchor ; - defend: defends an anchor ; - hunt: cheat-searches for enemies in the system, once all enemies are dead, sits around and waits for more enemies ; - patrol: flies between gates in this system, if multiple gates are available. Otherwise leaves. "orbit"

; Spawn location ; ; Modes are: ; - player: spawns at the player ; - target: spawns at the current target of the player (otherwise spawns at player) ; - random: spawns in a random location in the system "player"

Properties.DynamicData: ; Get nearest active enemy that isnt the player ; The player very likely set invulnerability if they are ; doing something that involves spawning in ships ; We can use a different option for handling attacking the player (sysFindObject gSource "sTAENZ")

Events.ADT.onLoadGlobals:
(block ()
; Global constants
(setq ADT_objCreateModeUI { orbit: "Orbit a fixed location" defend: "Defend a fixed location" hunt: "Hunt down enemy ships in this system" patrol: "Patrol this system" })
(setq ADT_objCreateLocationUI { player: "Spawn at your current location" target: "Spawn at the location of your target (or yourself if you have no target)" random: "Spawn at a random location in the system (Favors system generation locations)" })
; Lambdas
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; ;; Create object modes ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;; Accessors (setq ADT_objCreateGetSov (lambda () (typ@ &ADT_vvCreateObjectSettings; "adt.objCreate.sov"))) (setq ADT_objCreateGetMode (lambda () (typ@ &ADT_vvCreateObjectSettings; "adt.objCreate.mode"))) (setq ADT_objCreateGetLocation (lambda () (typ@ &ADT_vvCreateObjectSettings; "adt.objCreate.location")))
;; Setters (setq ADT_objCreateSetSov (lambda (sov) (typSet@ &ADT_vvCreateObjectSettings; "adt.objCreate.sov" sov))) (setq ADT_objCreateSetMode (lambda (mode) (if (@ ADT_objCreateModeUI mode) (typSet@ &ADT_vvCreateObjectSettings; "adt.objCreate.mode" mode) (typSet@ &ADT_vvCreateObjectSettings; "adt.objCreate.mode" "orbit") ) )) (setq ADT_objCreateSetLocation (lambda (loc) (if (@ ADT_objCreateLocationUI loc) (typSet@ &ADT_vvCreateObjectSettings; "adt.objCreate.location" loc) (typSet@ &ADT_vvCreateObjectSettings; "adt.objCreate.location" "player") ) ))
;; Settings menu
;; Open obj create mode menu (setq ADT_objCreateObjectModeMenuOpen (lambda () (scrShowScreen gScreen &ADT_dsCreateObjectOptionsMode;))) ;; Open obj create mode menu text (setq ADT_objCreateObjectModeMenuText (lambda () (cat "Mode: " (ADT_objCreateGetMode))))
;; Open obj create location menu (setq ADT_objCreateObjectPosMenuOpen (lambda () (scrShowScreen gScreen &ADT_dsCreateObjectOptionsLoc;))) ;; Open obj create location menu text (setq ADT_objCreateObjectPosMenuText (lambda () (cat "Position: " (ADT_objCreateGetLocation))))
;; Open obj create sov menu (setq ADT_objCreateObjectSovMenuOpen (lambda () (scrShowScreen gScreen &ADT_dsCreateObjectOptionsSov;))) ;; Open obj create sov menu text (setq ADT_objCreateObjectSovMenuText (lambda () (cat "Sovereign: " (block ((sov ADT_objCreateGetSov)) (if sov (typGetName sov) "Object's Default")))))
;; List of all create objects settings menu options (can be extended by other mods) (setq ADT_uiCreateObjectSettingsMenuOptions (list { text: ADT_objCreateObjectModeMenuText action: ADT_objCreateObjectModeMenuOpen isDS: True } { text: ADT_objCreateObjectPosMenuText action: ADT_objCreateObjectPosMenuOpen isDS: True } { text: ADT_objCreateObjectSovMenuText action: ADT_objCreateObjectSovMenuOpen isDS: True } ))
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; ;; Create object functions ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;; Sort Creatable Types (setq ADT_sortKeyObjectTypes (lambda (typ) (cat "TYPE_PRIORITY:" (hex (ADT_typCategoryPriority obj) 8) "\nSOVEREIGN:" (typGetName (or (typ@ theType 'defaultSovereign) (typ@ theType 'sovereign))) "\nSOVEREIGN_UNID:" (fmtUNID (or (typ@ theType 'defaultSovereign) (typ@ theType 'sovereign))) "\nNAME:" (typGetName typ) "\nUNID:" (fmtUNID typ) ) ))
;; Type Priority Sort subkey (setq ADT_typCategoryPriority (lambda (typ) (block ( (m (lambda (criteria) (typMatches typ criteria))) (defaultSov (or (typ@ theType 'defaultSovereign) (typ@ theType 'sovereign))) (isPlayer (= defaultSov &svPlayer;)) (isFriend (= (sovGetDisposition defaultSov &svPlayer;) 'friend)) (isNeutral (= (sovGetDisposition defaultSov &svPlayer;) 'neutral)) (isEnemy (= (sovGetDisposition defaultSov &svPlayer;) 'enemy)) (isStation (m "T")) (isShip (m "s")) (isWorld (m "t")) (isVirtual (m "V")) (isUntyped (=== (objGetType obj))) ) (switch isUntyped 0xFFFFFFFF (and isShip isVirtual) 0xFFFFFFFE (and isStation isVirtual) 0xFFFFFFFD (and isStation isPlayer) 0x20 (and isStation isFriend) 0x21 (and isStation isNeutral) 0x22 (and isStation isEnemy) 0x23 isStation 0x24 (and isShip isPlayer) 0x40 (and isShip isFriend) 0x41 (and isShip isNeutral) 0x42 (and isShip isEnemy) 0x43 isShip 0x44 isWorld 0x50 ;; other 0x80000000 ) ) ))
;; Open obj create selection menu (setq ADT_objCreateObjectSelectMenuOpen (lambda () (scrShowScreen gScreen &ADT_dsCreateObject;)))
;; Open obj create options menu (setq ADT_objCreateObjectOptionsMenuOpen (lambda () (scrShowScreen gScreen &ADT_dsCreateObjectOptions;)))
;; List of all create objects options menu options (can be extended by other mods) (setq ADT_uiCreateObjectMainMenuOptions (list { text: "Create objects" action: ADT_objCreateObjectSelectMenuOpen isDS: True } { text: "Create objects settings" action: ADT_objCreateObjectOptionsMenuOpen isDS: True } ))
;; Open obj create menu (setq ADT_objCreateMainMenuOpen (lambda () (scrShowScreen gScreen &ADT_dsCreateObjectMain;)))
